hackathon-description-text: Global App Initiative is hosting it's second ever Global Appathon! Come work on any app-realated project for the chance to win a prize, eat great food, and have an amazing time with friends! Our exclusive help bar will make sure that at every point of the challenge, you have a go to person to see and get help with all your technical or UI/UX questions.
hackathon-rules: First rule about appathon: don't talk about appathon (but please do). All previous work must be stated and documented via submissions to challenge post. All progress must be done during the course of the hackathon.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Just as equally cool of a trophy.
A trophy that is equal in beauty to the other trophies ;)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Boston University, Boston University, 720 Commonwealth Avenue, Boston, MA 02215, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Best overall app developed at the hackathon.
Old project that has been most improved over the course of the hackathon.
Best app that was started from scratch at the hackathon.
App with the best user interface and interactions.

hackathon-location-address: Boston University, Boston University, 720 Commonwealth Avenue, Boston, MA 02215, USA
hackathon-description-header: Join the Global Appathon this Jan. 31st for a 12-hour app based hackathon!
